question: 感動する
sourceAnswer: To Be Emotionally Moved, To Be Moved Emotionally, To Be Moving
sourceMnemonic: You know this is a verb from the <ja>する</ja>. Your <kanji>feeling</kanji>s have been <kanji>move</kanji>d. So, when your feelings have been moved, you are emotionally moved. This word is <vocabulary>to be emotionally moved</vocabulary> or simply <vocabulary>to be moving</vocabulary>. Just be sure to know this has to do with emotions.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
